title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.1 - Penalties attach until dispute decided
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.1 - Penalties attach until dispute decided

State Regulations

When a race is in dispute both the horse that
finished first and any horse claiming the race shall be liable to all the
penalties attaching to the winner of that race until the matter is
decided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4039.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
